  PROFILE 
 Senior marketing/communications leader with an international scope in Energy and Retail. 
Looking for marketing/business development opportunities in Energy Transition related areas. I 
thrive when developing strategic relevance for society and customers, building partnerships and 
dealing with uncertainty. Goal oriented, positive and strategic co-creator who builds shared 
vision and value, stays the course and completes what he starts. As a performance driven and 
trusted teambuilder I coach my teams to be adaptive, solution oriented, collaborative and 
focused on growth. I take a personal interest in both supporting and challenging my team in 
such a way that they use and develop their strengths to be successful in their work, ensuring an 
inclusive and positive working environment. 
 
 EMPLOYMENT HISTORY 
 Energy Transition & Operations Manager at Shell External Relations  
Mid 2018 — Present 
Purpose: Build and strengthen Shell’s reputation and license-to-operate by leading a team that 
supports New Business Development projects in a dynamic external environment. Develop 
collaboration with high interest stakeholders. Inform general public on the role of Shell NL i n the 
country’s energy transition through the development of impactful communication campaigns. 
Key achievements: 
● Leading the delivery of corporate communications expertise to enable the final 
investment decisions and realization of 15+ Energy Transition projects in NL (ex: e-
mobility, renewable power, geothermal and hydrogen) 
● Increasing Shell’s visibility as energy transition enabler in a very challenging context by 
engaging external stakeholders and the general public on key issues and business 
opportunities 
● Coaching and developing team of communications and stakeholder relations 
professionals, empowering them to be successful and make impact whilst achieving high 
employee satisfaction scores 
External Relations Marketing Campaigns Manager at Shell Netherlands 
2016 — mid 2018 
Purpose: Build Shell's reputation as a credible enabler of the Energy Transition in the 
Netherlands. 
Key achievements:  
● Responsible for the redesign of Shell's corporate brand campaign in NL, resonating better 
with target audiences by using Dutch Energy Transition projects as hero stories and 
leading to increased trust and reputation 

 
 TOP 5 STRENGHTS (GALLUP)  
Arranger  
Adaptability  
Maximizer  
Positivity  
Learner 
 
REFERENCES 
Available on request 
  ● Identification of Energy Transition opportunities in the Metropolitan Area of Amsterdam 
and initiate strategic alliances between Shell businesses and external partners to 
materialize these opportunities 
● Successful delivery of large-scale business conferences with partners such as the 
Amsterdam Economic Board, the Energy Reinvented Community and Accenture 
Innovation Awards 
● Leading and developing a team of external relations professionals 
 
Fuels Marketing & Communications Manager - Retail at Shell Retail Benelux/France 
2010 — 2015 
Purpose: Grow Shell Retail's fuels volume/margin and market share profitably through 
developing and implementing effective integrated retail marketing propositions. 
Key achievements: 
● Built strategic alliance with Philips (consumer products) to develop co-branded marketing 
campaigns delivering increased fuels margin for Shell and increased sales volumes for 
Philips’ key product categories  
● Delivered customer-focused retail marketing campaigns in 4 countries, stimulating 
upselling/cross-selling 
● Integral part of the team that successfully won the tender for the lease of Europe’s largest 
retail service station (in Luxembourg) and built the integrated fuels/food/convenience 
retail proposition for customers 
● Lead

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
